name: Administrative Management
description: Oversees office operations, administrative support staff, and daily organizational processes. Manages scheduling, documentation, resource allocation, and compliance with company policies to maintain efficient workplace operations.

name: Business Operations
description: Directs company-wide operational strategy, process optimization, and cross-functional collaboration. Oversees budget planning, resource management, and performance metrics to ensure day-to-day business efficiency and alignment with strategic goals.

name: Customer Success
description: Builds and maintains strong client relationships by driving product adoption and satisfaction. Monitors usage metrics, coordinates onboarding, and addresses escalations to ensure long-term retention and account growth.

name: Customer Support
description: Handles customer inquiries, technical troubleshooting, and issue resolution. Provides guidance on product usage, collaborates with internal teams to escalate complex problems, and ensures timely communication with end users.

name: Data Science
description: Collects, cleans, and analyzes large datasets to uncover trends and inform business strategy. Develops predictive models, statistical analyses, and machine learning solutions for data-driven decision-making.

name: Defense Technology
description: Researches, designs, and develops advanced military or defense solutions, including surveillance, autonomy, or reconnaissance systems. Integrates emerging technologies to enhance security, intelligence, and mission-critical capabilities.

name: Finance
description: Manages financial planning, budgeting, and accounting operations. Oversees revenue recognition, regulatory compliance, and complex financial reporting while driving cost optimization and strategic investment decisions.

name: Hardware Engineering
description: Designs, prototypes, and tests physical technology products, electronic circuits, and embedded systems. Collaborates with cross-functional teams to optimize performance, reliability, and manufacturability of hardware solutions.

name: Human Resources
description: Oversees talent acquisition, employee relations, benefits, and workplace policies. Fosters a positive work environment through performance management, professional development, and compliance with labor regulations.

name: Implementation
description: Plans and executes customer onboarding and solution deployment. Coordinates cross-functional resources, manages timelines, and ensures alignment with client requirements for successful product integration.

name: IT & InfoSec
description: Maintains IT infrastructure, network security, and technical support services. Implements information security standards, monitors system performance, and protects sensitive data against unauthorized access.

name: Legal
description: Advises on legal strategies, drafts contracts, and ensures regulatory and policy compliance. Manages dispute resolution, intellectual property rights, and risk mitigation to protect company interests.

name: Marketing
description: Develops and executes marketing strategies, brand initiatives, and promotional campaigns. Conducts market research, manages content creation, and oversees digital channels to drive customer awareness and engagement.

name: Product Design
description: Creates user-centric interfaces, experiences, and visual identities. Conducts user research, prototypes design concepts, and collaborates with engineering to deliver intuitive, aesthetically aligned products.

name: Product Management
description: Defines product vision, roadmap, and feature requirements based on market analysis and user feedback. Collaborates with stakeholders to prioritize development, ensure timely releases, and optimize product-market fit.

name: Program Management
description: Leads multiple, interrelated projects or initiatives. Sets program objectives, manages stakeholders, and aligns resources to strategic goals, ensuring cohesive execution and delivery across workstreams.

name: Project Management
description: Plans and coordinates individual projects from inception to completion. Oversees timelines, resources, risk mitigation, and stakeholder communication to deliver on defined scope and objectives.

name: Sales
description: Develops and executes sales strategies to drive revenue and client acquisition. Manages prospect pipelines, negotiates contracts, and collaborates with cross-functional teams to meet or exceed sales targets.

name: Software Engineering
description: Architects and implements software solutions, applications, and systems. Writes and reviews code, collaborates with cross-functional teams, and ensures maintainability, scalability, and performance.

name: Technical Program Management
description: Coordinates complex engineering efforts and product launches. Aligns technical and business requirements, manages cross-functional resources, and drives on-time delivery of high-impact technical programs.
